titles.title: A concurrent resolution relative to adjournment to a date certain during the remainder of the 100th Congress.

action.text: Called up by House as Privileged Matter.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Voice Vote.

vote.text: Resolution agreed to in Senate without amendment by Voice Vote.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.

bill.summary: 7/29/1987--Introduced. Prescribes a procedure for an adjournment in excess of three days or for the sine die adjournment of the House of Representatives and the Senate for the remainder of the 100th Congress.
